modName: Pre and Post Reproccer fix for IA7_1
summary: Carries over fixes from [url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?]IA7.1[/url] that are not yet covered by Xathra's [url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48629/?]SkyRe Compatibility and ReProccer Patches[/url].
descriptionHtml:
Carries over fixes from [url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?]IA7.1[/url] that are not yet covered by Xathra's [url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48629/?]SkyRe Compatibility and ReProccer Patches[/url].

[size=14][color=green][b]What gets Carried over:[/b][/color][/size]
See changelog and Readme for a list of changes
Corrects the file paths that changed from IA7 to IA7.1.
Corrects item names that were changed.
Corrects item equip slots to match IA7.1's "more compatible" equipment, wear more gear at once.
Updated version of Xathra's Stats.xml to work with IA7.1

[size=14][color=green][b]Installation:[/b][/color][/size]
Make sure to install Xathra's [url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48629/?]SkyRe Compatibility and ReProccer Patches[/url] first.
NMM:
Download with NMM and read the installer options carefully to ensure you install the correct version of the files for your installed mods.
Manual:
Not recommended.
Run Reproccer. Enjoy.
Updating from v2.4 to v2.5 does not require the Reproccer to be rerun. All other upgrades require it to be run though.

[size=14][color=yellow][b]Notes:[/b][/color][/size]
Will be flagged with several ITMs, [b][color=red]DO NOT[/b][/color] clean this file or you may not get any of the changes. The ITMs are harmless and will not cause any issues.

[size=14][color=yellow][b]Load Order:[/b][/color][/size]
Skyrim.esm
Stuff.esp
And.esp
Things.esp
BashPatch.esp
Xathras'IA7'PreReproccer.esp <Replaces this.
Reproccer.esp (or SUM.esp)
Xathras'IA7'PostReroccer.esp <Replaces this.

[size=14][color=red][b]Known issues:[/size][/b][/color]
None
author: Raulfin

files.name: Pre and Post reproccer Replacers_CCOR
files.changelogHtml:
Completely Reworked as replacer files
Boiled Chitin set renamed Boiled Chitin Heavy
Dragon Knight Armor renamed Dragon Knight Heavy Armor
Dragon Knight Sleek Gauntlets renamed Dragon Knight Light Gauntlets and made light armor will no longer be affect Fists of Steel perk
Dragonbone Ebonsteel set renamed Dragonscale Ebonsteel and made light armor will no longer affect Fists of Steel perk
Eyepatch Changed to Misc slot
Glacial Crystal Armor renamed Glacial Crystal Heavy Armor
Gold Earrings changed to Ear slot
Jorrvaskr Shield renamed Jorrvaskr Heavy Shield
Heavy Skyforge Heavy Shield renamed Skyforge Heavy Shield
Shaman Armor set renamed Shaman Light Armor and made visible
Tribunal armor sets made visible
Tribunal Heavy Gloves should now properly benefit from the Fists of Steel perk
Tribunal Masks made visible
Can now equip a cloak with Tribunal Mantle Armor
Can now equip a cloak with Vagabond Armor
Carried over several hundred other minor changes

files.name: Pre and Post reproccer Replacers_CCOR
files.changelogHtml: Corrected keyword count for Shaman Light Gloves, Imperial Knight Greaves & Dragon Knight Gloves.

files.name: Pre and Post reproccer Replacers_CCOR
files.changelogHtml:
Correctly changes hoods & 'loose fitting' helms to allow earrings to be worn.
Corrects several past fixes that didn't get saved to "Pre ReProccer Fixes CCOR IA7 UU aMidianSS Content Addon Patch.esp"

files.name: Pre and Post Reproccer Replacers
files.changelogHtml:
Added Non-CCOR Post Reproccers & IA7 only PreReproccer
The Non-CCOR Post Reproccers aer not editing any of the items that IA7.1 changed so they actually contain no changes.
Files are included in the same download in separate folders Marked CCOR and Non-CCOR
A few minor things I missed in the PreReproccers

files.name: Pre and Post Reproccer Replacers
files.changelogHtml:
Added a FOMOD installer, special thanks to krysalynne for creating it!
Added 2 Stats.xml files based on the two in Xathras misc section of downloads, with the new IA7.1 item names. The "Default Stats replacer" is the Stats.xml that comes in Xathras downloads but tweaked for the new item names. If you use a custom xml file I recommend checking the forum post on the page to see what changes should be made.
Corrected a master list error from using my own copy that has a custom merge patch as a master, this will only affect users of the "Post ReProccer Fixes CCOR IA7 IW Patch.esp" version.
A few minor name corrections, Non-CCOR users should now use the included PostReproccer Patch, as it now has some correction in it.

files.name: Pre and Post Reproccer Replacers
files.changelogHtml:
Corrected keywords so ReProcer can properly handle several armor sets, including;
Armored/Padded Fur Hood
DragonHide Heavy/Light
Dwarven Mage Heavy/Light
Ebony Mage Heavy/Light
Shaman Light
Boiled Chitin Heavy/Light
Glacial Crystal Heavy/Heavy
Some of the Tribunal Heavy/Light
Corrected proper material keywords on tribunal heavy/light that wasn't being carried over into the post patch, these pieces should now properly benefit from tempering.
Corrected keyword count on several Mage Armor Heavy/Light versions to prevent keyword loss.
Typo of "Imperial Studded Armor" in Stats.xml corrected, should now receive proper armor rating for light armor and not heavy armor.
A few other similar fixes that I forgot to write down and can't remember anymore.
Removed Fists of Steel from several light armor gauntlets that shouldn't have had it.
